testcase.name: Register a new user successfully
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the sign-up page..............................................passed When I enter valid registration details.....................................passed And I click the submit button...............................................passed Then I should be registered and redirected to the contact page..............passed

testcase.classname: Adding a new contact and validating it on the contact details page
testcase.name: Add a new contact and validate it on contact details page
testcase.system-out: When I press the add new contact button.....................................passed Then I navigate to Add Contact page.........................................passed When I fill all the required fields.........................................passed And I press the submit button...............................................passed Then I navigate to Contact List Page and I should see the particular contact.passed

testcase.classname: Adding a new contact and validating it on the contact details page
testcase.name: Add a new contact with invalid type of birthday date and validate the error message
testcase.system-out: When I go to Add Contact page...............................................passed And I fill all the required fields with invalid date of birth...............passed And I press the submit button...............................................passed Then I should see the error message for invalid type of birthday date.......passed

testcase.classname: Delete an existing contact and validating it
testcase.name: Delete a contact and validate that it should not be visible in the contacts
testcase.system-out: When I go to Contact List Page..............................................passed When I navigate to Contact Details and delete the particular contact........passed Then I navigate back to the Contact Page....................................passed
